docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

apis.short_description: Send data to the task from external executor (such as smart_proxy_dynflow)

params.name: task_id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

params.name: step_id
params.description: The id of the step inside the execution plan to send the event to

params.name: data
params.description: Data to be sent to the action
